Published November 30 2014

"Coming Soon" is more of a cute colloquialism

"Coming Soon" is more of a cute colloquialism — A hack at Sony Pictures has resulted in the videos for “Fury,” “Annie,” “Mr. Turner,” “Still Alice” and “To Write Love on Her Arms” being put up on file-sharing sites.

Enjoy your day.
